page.title: 02Description continued.
page.content: There are many disused quarries which provided the stone for the industrial expansion, and one large working quarry at Crosland Hill. The towns and villages of the area offer varied shopping facilities and there are regular bus services to the nearby town of Huddersfield. Leisure amenities are good with many sports clubs, a golf course, and a swimming pool and leisure centre in Slaithwaite. The ten primary schools of the area send children to a single one thousand seven hundred pupil comprehensive school in Linthwaite.
